transcript.text: I love your videos and I love this idea
so I wanted to send my two cents the
reason I'm in love with this movement is
because the Q jobs have been resonating
with me since the very beginning I just
loved the positive patriotic message and
the questions that were being asked and
leading us to research things on our own
certainly corroborated things I had
researched in the past things that I had
heard and tried not to believe and you
know of course some things that were
completely unknown to me so I liked that
Q was asking us and not telling us what
to think and I loved the messages being
so unifying and even mentioning God and
calling for prayer was something that I
think I needed right now after
everything I've learned so I've loved
being on this journey especially with
you and all the other truthers and
patriots in our community and on YouTube
I think this has been absolutely the
most unbelievable experience to
participate in and I can't wait to see
what unfolds from here it's been
wonderful coming into a group a large
group of people who I feel comfortable
communicating with you know it's been
tough my own personal circle to talk
about any of this stuff a lot of my
family and friends are just not they're
not not open to it right now
so I've enjoyed having such a diverse
group of Patriots all across the country
and even the world who are commenting
and who are contributing their their
research their thoughts it's just been
awesome so I'm really encouraged by
everything that's happened especially
lately
all of the proofs that we've been given
all throughout the entire queue
phenomenon the one that really sealed
the deal for me was when President Trump
said tip-top tippy-top shape the White
House on Easter Sunday I believe an
unknown had asked him to use that breeze
as a proof to us and when he did it was
so out of context and really so out of
place it was so obvious that I I knew
for sure from that moment forward that
not only is Q real but you know
President Trump is certainly a part of
the Q team and a part of this movement
and this is his way of including us in
what he's doing and what the team is
doing because the mainstream media is
just not on his side obviously so we're
getting we're being brought along the
journey if we wish
we're being exposed to things that are
good for us to know and understand and
like you said many months ago you know
what can it hurt why not why not jump on
the train get on the wagon and see where
it goes
I really refuse to be so cynical and
hopeless and think that there is no way
for things to get better if people got
us into this mess then people can get us
out and we are the people we do have
more power than we ever realized before
and it feels amazing to be reminded of
that thanks
